mapper.insert: insert into t_mall_commodity (Id, commodity_name, commodity_imger, one_class_table, secondary_class_table, brand_id, create_time, commodity_descrption) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityImger,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oneClassTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secondaryClassTable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{commodityDescrption,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select Id, commodity_name, commodity_imger, one_class_table, secondary_class_table, brand_id, create_time, commodity_descrption from t_mall_commodity
